commands.name: kz
commands.title: Search South Korea Postal Codes
commands.subtitle: Kozip
commands.description: Search for South Korea addresses with support for multiple formats

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` again.

" && exit 1
